title: Washington Monument: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar       National Mall and Memorial Parks Centennial Events 8/21 - 8/28 can be viewed on our Centennial Celebration page.          Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 41 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      National Mall and Memorial Parks  Memorials of the Reflecting Pool      Time: 10:00 AM,2:00 PM,6:00 PM Location: Lincoln Memorial Plaza (street level) Fees: FREE     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 05/01/2016 to 09/05/2016 Ranger Led Walk (<1 mile) View Details      National Mall and Memorial Parks  Memorials of the Tidal Basin      Time: 12:00 PM,4:00 PM,8:00 PM Location: Martin Luther King, Jr. Memorial Plaza (Independence Ave SW & West Basin Drive SW) Fees: FREE     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 05/01/2016 to 09/05/2016 Ranger Led Walk (<1 mile) View Details      National Mall and Memorial Parks  The Air War over Europe: The Men, the Machines, and the Missions      Time: 3:00 PM to 4:00 PM,5:00 PM to 6:00 PM Location: World War II Memorial (contact station) Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Ranger Led Walk (about .5 mile) View Details      National Mall and Memorial Parks  Washington Monument- Summer Hours End Monday, September 5, 2016      Time: 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM Location: Washington Monument  Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 05/28/2016 to 09/05/2016 Entry into monument requires ticket.
